short_description: marathon distribution services is a trucking and logistics company based in compton, california, united states.
long_description: marathon distribution services is a southern california based third party logistics (3pl) and supply chain management provider with over 850,000 square feet of warehousing specializing in the handling of consumer goods, electronics, home goods, clothing, footwear, non-perishable food grade storage and more. in addition, marathon distribution services offers in-house local container drayage as well as ltl and tl delivery options featuring a "real-time" comprehensive tracking system. marathon distribution services is your 3pl choice in the western united states. marathon distribution services offers convenient, rail yard, port, freeway and airport sites in southern california. marathon distribution services is a full service warehouse and 3rd party logistic supplier. we are expers in handling all commodities; consumer goods, electronics, durable goods, pet products, footwear, apparel, home goods, and non-perishable food industries. we offer bonded and duty-paid public warehousing and distribution that services chain stores, local retailers, e-commerce b2b and b2c.
